events.name: We have jungle at home: decorating succulent pots
events.location: Briggs Field A (EC Fort Construction Site)
events.description: Come decorate your very own succulent pot with a variety of art supplies.

events.description: Take a peek inside your future home with a New Vassar tour, guided by a New Vassar resident

events.name: baking without a recipe!
events.description: baking by ✨vibes✨ (come bake cupcakes with us! no recipes allowed, only vibes :D)

events.name: Slice to Meet You
events.description: Come to meet some new friends while eating pizza!

events.name: Burton (Pop)^4
events.description: Want a snack? Come visit for POPcorners. POPsicles. POPtarts. RingPOPs

events.name: Face Painting
events.description: Have you ever wanted to be transformed into a cat? Come get your face painted and that dream can come true! Embrace the uncertainty by having a random stranger paint your face who has no idea what they are doing. Or channel your inner artist and come paint our faces!

events.name: Befoul Our Walls
events.description: The Black Hole floor has a policy that anyone can draw anything on our walls whenever they want and however they want. Come over and add to our wonderful menagerie of meaningless 2am poems and Cthulhu murals!

events.name: MacTour #1
events.description: Want to look at what MacGregor rooms and common areas look like in person? Come on a 30 minute MacTour!!

events.name: Tako Takoyaki Time
events.description: Come eat some tasty octopus balls made by yours truly, BMF 🐙🐙🐙🐙

events.name: Mitski and Mochi
events.description: we will eat Mochi while vibing to Mitski

events.name: Movie night
events.description: We will be hosting a movie night in the chocolate city lounge

events.name: MCC chickens & mochi donuts
events.description: Missed dinner? No worries! Come join us for ALL types of chicken - wings, nuggets, tenders, korean chicken, vegetarian options will be provided!

events.name: B1ANKETS AND POWERPO1NTS
events.description: Cozy up and present some utterly nonsensical powerpoints made by the b1ners!

events.name: We're not here
events.description: Where’s “here” 🤔?

events.name: Dentry Cafe
events.description: Start/End your day with some despresso, dea, and dastries!

events.name: Square Pancakes
events.description: Fuel up before REX events with a pancake breakfast!

events.name: New Vassar Street Waffles
events.description: Come and grab some breakfast and meet new friends!

events.name: LEONARDO B1 B1NC1
events.description: Did you know that Leonardo Da Vinci invented pancakes? Did you know that b1 invented Leonardo Da Vinci? Get in touch with your inner Da Vinci, create multicolored pancakes, and enjoy them with some b1ners!

events.name: Power Through Every Twilight Movie
events.description: Am I a Twihard? No. Have I read the Twilight books? Also no. Do I even like these movies? Meh. I rGather round, mock Edward's response to smelling Bella for the first time, and make some lifelong friends.

events.name: Wake Up and Bake Up
events.description: come enjoy brunch & baked goods with burton third!

events.name: Bagels & Locks
events.description: pick bagels and eat locks. or eat picks and lock bagels? learn how to pick LOCKS locks and BAGELS bagels mmmmmm nom nom monch cronch

events.name: Let's Play! Puzzle Game(s)
events.description: Backseat us and eat food while we blindly stumble through neuron-activating video games like Counterfeit Monkey and Chants of Senaar!

events.name: Worm on a String Crafting
events.description: do you like worms on a string? do you like crafting? come explore the simmons craft room via worm on a string related crafts! we’ll be making anything from earrings to paintings and whatever else our supplies allows :)

events.name: Will It Waffle?
events.description: do marshmallows belong in a waffle? how about cheese? swedish fish? seaweed? come try out the endless possibilities and make the most delicious unholy waffle concoction! (traditional ingredients/toppings will also be available)

events.name: Twilight Marathon
events.description: Come watch all 5 twilight movies with us. Learn about TITSOAK, cracking open "cold ones," and imprinting on newborn babies. Some snacks will be provided. If you aren't coming to this event then where the hell are you, loca?

events.name: Maseeh Smoothie Social
events.description: Join us for a refreshing break at the Maseeh Smoothie Social! Swing by around lunchtime to blend up some delicious smoothies and cool down from the summer heat. It's the perfect opportunity to refresh yourself and meet new friends from our dorm.

events.name: GATAS
events.description: Play a classic Simmons game with Sims!!

events.name: BC Dorm Tour
events.description: Come explore Burton Conner on a student-led tour and make friends with the mice! *NOTE*: The last tour will leave half an hour before the end time!

events.name: Taste of Cambridge
events.description: Hungry but don’t know where to go in Cambridge? We got you! We bring you delicious food from the finest dining establishments around. Though we don’t recommend you mix all the flavors together, we do recommend that you come and stuff your face!

events.name: Fire & Ice I
events.description: Turns out smashing ice is quite therapeutic. Come vent and diy shaved ice with us.

events.name: Python Bee
events.description: the python bee is like a spelling bee, except instead of spelling a word you’re spelling a python program. the winner will get a bee of their very own

events.name: Duck Build
events.description: Build a duck-shaped cart for water wars!

events.name: Grill, Chill, and Build
events.description: power tools! ladders! safety! no experience required, burgers provided. Final push for East Side Party!

events.name: Hair Dyeing
events.description: East Campus is running a sale on Hair Dyeing and Bleaching services. Today only*, stop by for a complementary hair transformation experience! *Also Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday

events.name: Roofdeck Camping
events.description: Do you like the great outdoors? So do we, but they're far away. Join us on the Random roofdeck for good times in tents, drinking filtered water and eating instant food.

events.name: Explore NV
events.description: Take a peek inside your future home with a New Vassar tour, guided by a New Vassar resident

events.name: (Viscous) Jungle Juice
events.description: What's more amazonian jungle than fulfilling your middle school desires? It’s a jungle out there, so let’s slime our way through it together!

events.name: Dumb Ways to (Hair) Dye
events.description: Come get your hair dyed and chat with Sims!

events.name: J-Entry Jisgusting
events.description: Join us as we cook an array of jisgusting dishes and play card games! Pick from an array of ingredients and let your creativity soar as you concoct an… original combination of flavors. Past inventions include: meat cheesecake, tuna fruit salad, and mystery murky meatloaf.

events.name: Toobing
events.location: Briggs Field A (EC Fort Construction Site)
events.description: We have a very large tube, large enough to fit a person inside. Time to go toobing!

events.name: Simmons Pool Party
events.description: inflatable pool party!!! bring a swimsuit or jump in fully clothed. we won't judge

events.name: Tea & Tattoos
events.description: Do you like to drink tea (and spill tea)? Do you like making adult decisions but hate the commitment of sticking to said decisions? Do you have strong opinions on colonialism? Then come join C2 (aka the British Floor) for tea and tattoos! The tattoos may be temporary but tea time is forever.

events.name: Hyperbolic Crochet
events.description: come crochet hyperbolic objects!!! no experience required :D and you get a cool object! we will also have Tea and Friends and potentially Differential Geometry of Crochet

events.name: ruin your wardrobe
events.location: Briggs Field A (EC Fort Construction Site)
events.description: you probably came here with all those new clothes mommy and daddy bought for you. or you've already received some truly atrocious orientation shirt. either way, wouldn't it be nice to turn those into something you'd ACTUALLY wear? *BRING CLOTHES*

events.name: sports "investing"
events.description: hit your 33rd leg parlay

events.name: B5loat
events.description: Enjoy some root beer floats on a hot summer day!

events.description: Your one (and probably not only) chance to see all of Next House! Listen to some great stories while you walk our storied halls and witness such great things as our music room, communal kitchen, our eight wonderful wings, and more!

events.description: like art? doodle in class? try being the canvas! draw on yourself with temporary tattoo ink and markers

events.name: The Bisexual Experience of Your Life
events.description: Become bisexual. Eat hot chip. Lie. (Come celebrate bisexuality by eating hot chips and watching a classic bisexual-themed movie with us!

events.name: free taro(t readings?)!
events.description: wanna learn your future? your fortune? you thirsty? come drink some taro (or other flavors of boba) as the taro(t) reveals your fate >:3

events.name: BYOP (Build Your Own Pizza)
events.description: Pizza just doesn't get any better than when you make it yourself! Come choose from a truly ludicrous number of toppings and try your hand at tossing pizza dough. Pineapple pizza, pickle pizza, pesto pizza, pizza for dessert?!?  Vegan and gluten-free options available.

events.name: C3: Fruitapalooza
events.description: Are you ever overcome by the spontaneous urge to smash fruit? Eat fruit? Smash fruit and eat it? Eat fruit and smash it? Come satisfy these desires with Conner 3!

events.description: "Meet a friendly person named Jack Trade a deep secret for a tasty snack"

events.description: Come by E-Entry to grab some bubble tea, play board games, and make new friends in a chill and relaxed atmosphere!

events.name: Fire & Ice II

events.name: Meet the Simmons Heads of House!
events.description: Come meet the Heads of House of Simmons Hall! (Featuring a dog, homemade cookies, and homemade ice cream)

events.description: Looking for a real meal? How about a feast? Come chat with Fentry and eat an entire REX budget worth of a homecooked meal!

events.description: Indulge in the ultimate nighttime treat at Maseeh Hall's Signature Waffle Night! Join us for an evening of delicious, freshly-made waffles with all your favorite toppings. Come for the waffles, stay for the great company, and make some new friends along the way.

events.name: Poker Tournament
events.description: Feeling lucky? Participate in our infamous poker tournament!

events.description: WHO DOESN'T LIKE BOBA??? Pull through to enjoy tapioca pearls with an assortment of beverages, jigsaw puzzles, and the company of current Nexties!

events.description: Sing and dance your heart out with House 4's classic karaoke night. If singing isn't your thing, decorate a cupcake and get serenaded! Vegan options available.

events.name: EAST SIDE PARTY
events.description: Join us for our biggest party of the year, East Side Party! Ride student-made attractions, get space-trained, climb our bouldering wall, wrestle in substances never before wrestled in. Dance your way to freedom from the tyranny of normal life on our fort, the Temple of Doom! 💃

events.description: Are you craving a scalding hot waffle-shaped dill pickle? Curious about the frying time for an uncrustable on a waffle iron? Come challenge culinary norms with the Burton 4 players at "Will It Waffle?"

events.name: Turn Yourself into a TCG
events.description: Students can make a tcg card of themselves that can basically act like a name card or something to introduce themselves to others. Can also be used for door decoration where they can tack it on.

events.description: A little snack break where people can make their own jelly donut (actually onigiri or rice ball) and munch on it before they continue whatever event they're joining.

events.name: B5art
events.description: Draw on a balloon and blow it up, we have candy.

events.description: Never too late for a waffle!

events.description: Are you a talented artist? Or better yet, are you an untalented artist? Come paint large canvases, entire suits and dresses, or even yourself! Join the B4 Players for a relaxing night of painting, charcuterie, and good vibes.

events.description: Feeling saucy??  Come try out our selection of hot sauces!!  Will be served with chicken nuggets!!!  Will you be able to withstand the heat?? Or will you die trying... 😢

events.description: Am I a Twihard? No. Have I read the Twilight books? Also no. Do I even like these movies? Meh. I rGather round, mock Edward's response to smelling Bella for the first time, and make some lifelong friends.

events.name: Great British Bdecorate Off
events.description: On your mark, get set, decorate! Have you felt a lack of Delicious(????) Baked Goods in your life? Looking for an excuse to speak in a British accent? Then look no further! Come join C2 (the British floor) in decorating some totally edible, not-cursed baked goods.

events.description: Open mic. Instruments are not provided but are welcome. Sing a song, read a poem, tell a joke, do something

events.description: Dearest Gentle Reader, are you looking to be the Diamond of the Season? Show off your skills to the queen with your fan-painting skills, and consume delectable treats as you socialize amongst the ton.

events.name: no more table
events.description: No. More table.

events.name: B5nut
events.description: Try to eat a donut off a string attached to the ceiling, special prizes for those who can eat it without dropping it.

events.name: Dinin' with the Dinos
events.description: What do dinos eat? Other dinos of course! Sadly, MIT takes a very prejudiced stance on cannibalism, so we resorted to the next best thing. Join us as we make, bake, and intake dino shaped treats!

events.description: Have YOU ever wanted to simultaneously do an ab workout, play Catan, try our GRA's famous brownies, and drink boba? Have you ever wanted to just one of those things? If you have, join us for an evening of getting physically, mentally, and emotionally swole!

events.description: Come watch and sing along to the absolutely fantastic 2008 movie musical, Mamma Mia! There will be snacks!

events.name: Night Carnival
events.description: Games and PRIZES GALORE! Cotton candy, popcorn, and more! We're having a GIANT CARNIVAL BASH, and we're giving away so much food & prizes!! (Bring your friends!)

events.name: Next Haunt - Haunted Escape Room!
events.description: 👻👻👻👻  Are you excited for Halloween? Yes, it's August, but ARE YOU EXCITED FOR HALLOWEEN? Or are you interested in spooky treats, clever tricks, and/or making new friends and winning with them? Then swing by Next Haunt's booth, where we'll have tons of snacks and candy, puzzles to solve for prizes, and maybe a little bit of spo0kiness! Next Haunt is a student group out of Next House that designs and builds a real-life haunted escape room every Halloween. We design puzzles, construct the building, make art, do makeup, and SCARE the poor souls who try to run our house, and we're always looking for volunteers, especially during the fall semester. No experience is required for any positions, so if any of this sounds interesting to you, please stop by the Next House dining hall this evening and say hi while enjoying the food and prizes!  👻👻👻👻

events.name: 2W: Sussy lassi
events.description: Come to 2W’s Lassi* 🥛 Bar! Enjoy carefully curated concoctions from the delicious 😍 to the downright dastardly 😈. Try to guess our mystery flavor 👀. We’ll have funny fruits 🥑, fishy 🐟 flavorings and the best vibes 🧡. *Flavored yogurt drink. **Lactose-free options available

events.name: Blahaj Blast 4: Attack of the Blahaj
events.description: Make Baja Blast. Hold Blahaj. eom

events.description: Join in on trying to act out “crippling debt”, “doing the right thing”, and “ironically buying a trucker hat and then ironically being a trucker for 38 years”. And remember, only two things in life are certain: death and Texas.

events.description: Because we'll all collectively be having a meltdown while watching ✨ classics ✨ such as Twilight, Bee Movie, and The Room. Enjoy a slice while you cringe.

There will be a take home activity for you to custom blend for your own needs and use along with an opportunity to learn more about proper dilution and safe use.

events.description: Tired of bouncing around from event to event? Bounce around on exercise balls! Or hang out and enjoy some carnival games and snacks, complete with cotton candy, popcorn, and big soap bubbles!

events.name: Great McCormick Baking Show
events.description: Show off your cake-decorating skills at McCormick’s very own cake-off! We’ll bring the cakes, you bring the friends!

events.name: Spilling the Gongfu Tea
events.description: Gongfu style tea, originating from China, involves multiple quick steeps with high quality tea leaves. Come experiment with this ancient style of tea, along with western methods for a delightful experience!

events.name: Pierogi Power Hour
events.description: Did your babtsya never teach you how to make pierogies or varenyky? Don't worry! We'll be your local grandmothers and show you the Ukrainian way, with blueberries and cheese

events.name: Jungle Jewelry
events.description: Embody the amazon jungle by making charm and bead jewelry!

events.name: Maseeh Building Tour 2
events.description: Discover the heart of Maseeh Hall with our Dorm Building Tour! Join us for an informative and fun walkthrough of our amazing dorm. You'll get to see all the key spots, learn about the building's unique features, and find out why Maseeh Hall is such a great place to live.

events.name: Next Sing Open Rehearsal
events.description: Sing an acapella piece with Next Sing! No experience necessary!! We will provide sheet music :D

events.name: PROTEST!!!
events.description: to revolt is the natural tendency of life; even a worm turns against the foot that crushes it. prefrosh of mit, unite!

events.name: Jicnic in the Jourtyard
events.description: Join us for an afternoon of frockling outdoors in the MacGregor courtyard! Spend some time getting to know J Entry! Enjoy delicious picnic food! Polish your game of pickup basketball (or learn the very basics!) Have a jolly old time.

events.name: Marvelous Melty Meal
events.description: Relax with a raclette repas full of delicious melted cheese and chocolate fondue delights. You can indulge in a sweet and/or savory midday treat with your fellow frosh and vibe with the beautiful people of French House.

events.name: Grill, Fill, Chill
events.description: Come recharge for lunch with freshly grilled hamburgers, hot dogs, and chicken outside of Simmons!

events.name: P41NT THE HOUSE DOWN
events.description: House 4 needs some new wallpaper! Whether you're Picasso reincarnated or can't color inside the lines, join House 4 as we paint the house down (bootz).

events.name: Hair Dyeing
events.description: What better way to appreciate the spirit of individualism and self-reliance than to get your hair dyed in ALL OF THE COLORS because you can and why not

events.name: Grillz and Chillz
events.description: GRILLS R HOT ALL DAY! :D Come pick up a burg with friends

events.name: Jumpstart Your MTG Journey
events.description: Have you ever wanted to play a collectible card game, but had no idea where to start? Or are you a master in the ways of shiny cardboard? Either way, we have an exciting challege for you. Come build decks using MTG cards, and face fellow prefrosh in battles to see who triumphs.

events.name: Mystery Box
events.description: We have a box. You put your hand it in. You touch a thing. We laugh. You laugh? If you guess object. Win.

events.name: Graffiti Our Wall
events.description: Come help us decorate our suite! (100% legal)

events.name: cook for yourself
events.description: Teaching you the essentials to surviving

events.name: Sapphic Cartoons and Smoothies in the Plushie Pile
events.description: Are you sapphic? Do you like cartoons? Do you like plushies? If you answered yes to any of these questions (or just want to watch cartoons and meet new friends), then you should come to this event!

events.name: Explore NV
events.description: Take a peek inside your future home with a New Vassar tour, guided by a New Vassar resident

events.name: Doors 201: Lockpicking
events.description: An MIT education opens doors.

events.name: La Casa FC Tryouts (Not really)
events.description: Dream of playing for a top soccer team but decided to forgo that career to study at MIT? Try out for the next best thing at La Casa FC! Whether you're the next Messi or just found out what soccer is, join us for kicks, laughs, and maybe even some unexpected scouting!

events.name: Miracle B(2)erry
events.description: A berry sweet time

events.name: C4: Consume Cool iCe Cream
events.description: Come get some iCe Cream (its shaved iCe actually)! Cool down from the heat and Chat with C4 residents about life on C4, mit, or anything!

events.name: Goth Girl IHOP x Catboy Cafe
events.description: Stop by for emo pancakes, cookies, and more :3 learn about life at mit from local goths and catboys

events.name: Donuts and Documentaries
events.description: Fill your bellies with knowledge and your brains with breakfast food! Or something like that

events.name: Re-re-rejected REX Ideas
events.description: Running our re-re-rejected ideas. ? drawing competition: "not a drawing competition of a ? subject, but a drawing competition of ?s". 2000 piece puzzle: “press puzzling pieces to produce picture of phenomenal people”. Cities quiz: "name many, many cities". Mural painting! snaccs!

events.name: Dumb Ways to (Hair) Dye
events.description: Come get your hair dyed and chat with Sims!

events.name: C3: Blind Cake Decorating
events.description: Ever watched the Great British baking show? Like that, but instead of British it’s Irish*. And instead of professional bakers it’s college students. And instead of unobstructed vision it’s blindfolded. On the bright side, no hand-eye coordination required! *we aren’t actually Irish

events.name: New House 3 Dessert Bar
events.description: We'll be dishing up shaved ice, freshly made sago, and even have a matcha chocolate fountain. Come by for your favorite sweet treats and a great time with New House 3!

events.name: Plank your rocks off
events.description: do u like rocks? do u want rock-hard abs? bring a rock to trade a rock. or do a plank to take a rock. talk about rocks. rocks and rock-hard abs are not needed to participate

events.name: Get Hosed
events.description: Looking to escape the heat???  Come get your first taste of MIT's Firehose and pummel other prefrosh with water balloons!!!  We promise it'll be more fun than getting hosed with work during the semester!

events.name: Board Games and Puzzles with C Entry
events.description: Get to know C entry through an afternoon of board games and puzzles, complete with C-themed (and other) snacks! Vegan and gluten-free options will be available.

events.name: Powerpoint Karaoke
events.description: Want to brush up your presentation skills? Get a random powerpoint on a silly topic and present on it on the fly to your fellow frosh!

events.name: The Great Duck Race
events.description: Looking for some friendly competition? Join us for the 2nd annual Simmons Duck Race! We will be racing rubber ducks across the Charles River... just kidding, it's an inflatable kiddie pool on Vassar Street.

events.name: Simmon' Dots
events.description: Come eat dipping dots ice cream outside of Simmons and enjoy the view of the sponge!

events.name: EVERYTH1NG 1S B1UE
events.description: Unleash your inner Smurf™ with the b1ners! Paint signs, spears, your friends, or whatever your Smurf™ heart desires with any shade of b1ue!

events.name: jarred and feathered
events.description: Jeopardy meets tape meets gravity meets whipped cream meets feathers meets fan favorite 17th century pastimes.

events.name: Smoothie, Rattle, and Roll
events.description: Come chill with us at C5! Whip up your own smoothie masterpiece, munch on some tasty snacks, dive into fun games, and get all your burning questions answered. Good vibes guaranteed!

events.name: Destiny Soapmaking
events.description: Come to destiny and make your very own personalized bar of soap! You can choose your soap type (like goat's milk or shea butter), color, fragrance, botanical additives, and more! Experiment with adding petals and pouring swirled patterns into the soap of your dreams.

events.name: Super Secret Gay Time
events.description: the secret­est, gayest time. come chat and eat snacks!

events.name: Grillz and Chillz
events.description: GRILLS R HOT ALL DAY! :D Come pick up a burg with friends

events.name: Hair Dyeing
events.description: What better way to appreciate the spirit of individualism and self-reliance than to get your hair dyed in ALL OF THE COLORS because you can and why not

events.name: Ping Pong, Pool, & Pizza
events.description: Come join us for a night of fun and games at the Ping Pong, Pool, and Pizza Night in the Maseeh Game Room! Whether you're a game enthusiast or just in it for the pizza, there's something for everyone.

events.name: Fire (no ice)
events.description: Come eat hot chicken. We will provide no relief from the pain. Bring your own milk.

events.name: Water Wars
events.description: Two sides, both alike in dignity, in fair MIT, where we lay our scene, from ancient grudge break to new mutiny, where civil water makes civil Killian unclean...

events.name: Desmond's Favorite Passtimes
events.description: The Desmond bunch enjoys the classics. Come get to know us while playing some of our favorite games like FIFA, Smash Bros, and Secret Hitler

events.name: A Next House Far, Far Away
events.description: Have you ever wanted to pretend you're Luke Skywalker, saving the galaxy from imminent doom? Or Darth Vader, intent on destroying it? Live out your Star Wars dreams with a lightsaber tournament, costumes, and space-themed snacks today!

events.name: B4 B4kes
events.description: Do you love the smell of freshly baked cookies? Have a secret family recipe you're dying to try out? Or maybe you just want to enjoy some tasty treats with friends? Join the B4 Players for a fun-filled night of baking!

events.name: cruftsmashing
events.description: wanna smash old electronics? have built up rage from the hassle of unpacking?, wanna see other people let out demons? come to cruft smashing and see what you and a tool of your choice can do to some old electronics.

events.name: Bentry Burgers and Basketball
events.description: Play basketball with burgers on the grill in the MacGregor courtyard with the residents of B Entry!

events.name: PanEnEs!
events.description: Feeling hungry? Stop by E-Entry's signature REX event to build yourself a delicious panini sandwich!

events.name: McCormick Tours
events.description: Get an insider tour of McCormick, including the Penthouse, Dance Studio, Craft Room, Country Kitchen, Gym, and more!

events.name: Game Night
events.description: Come wind down with French House and enjoy fun board games and light refreshments! Enjoy chips, dips, and drinks while engaging in relaxing gameplay with current house members. Eat our food, ask us about life at French House, MIT, or anything else your mind could think of.

events.name: New Vassar Tournament Series: Pool
events.description: Come join us in a three part game tournament. For day two, break out your pool skills and try to win a prize!

events.name: Power Through Every Twilight Movie
events.description: Am I a Twihard? No. Have I read the Twilight books? Also no. Do I even like these movies? Meh. I rGather round, mock Edward's response to smelling Bella for the first time, and make some lifelong friends.

events.name: B1UDGEONING WITH B1
events.description: Break stuff. Competitively.

events.name: friendship (bracelets) and tea
events.description: Come for the tea and bracelets, stay for the friendship! We have a cozy kitchen, everything you need to make your own tea blends, and way too much embroidery floss.

events.name: How To Cook For Yourself
events.description: Are you moving into a Cook-For-Yourself (CFY) community this fall and feeling nervous about keeping yourself fed? Join us for a quick rundown of food resources in our community as well as tried and true tips from veteran dorm chefs to make easy and tasty meals!

events.name: Pasta Ptuesday
events.description: hungry? lacking in nutrients? need something to do on [insert whatever day of the week this event is on] night? come eat pasta from our clamily (clam family) recipe!! (clam is a place and not an ingredient, this is a seafood-free event)

events.name: deep talks with shallow people
events.description: discuss the meaning of life, et al.

events.name: two east sushi & café
events.description: make sushi hand rolls, sip on made-to-order matcha lattes and coffee, and chat with nexties in 2e's cozy main lounge!

events.name: Weird Milkshakes
events.description: Ah yes, the perfect milkshake! We've got ice cream, chocolate syrup, ...soy sauce???

events.name: Webkinz Restaurant
events.description: Where we make recipes just like mama used to make and make gak

events.name: B5raoke
events.description: Join us for a friendly karaoke night to sing your favorite songs and eat your favorite snacks!

events.name: Dentry Cafe
events.description: Start/End your day with some despresso, dea, and dastries! No, the time is not a typo.

events.name: Sardines
events.description: As an MIT student, you probably think you’re unique, but is it ever too much? Do you ever gaze wistfully upon those who can blend in, such as, say, identical tinned fish in a can? Get your conformity on with a game of sardines!

events.name: Soviet Cartoons
events.description: Come watch clips from Gena the Crocodile, Soviet Winnie the Pooh and "Nu, pagodi" as well as a selection of my favorite Soviet-era Latvian animations for the sake of nostalgia or bring your own cartoon requests! We'll have kvass and other treats!

events.name: nail painting + mocktails
events.description: paint your nails and gossip with the gentry gays 💅

events.name: 2W: Fort building and lore telling
events.description: Come help build a cozy fort ⛺️ in our main lounge and vibe with us while we tell silly stories 🎤 about our wing and eat snacks! 😋

events.name: pl4y stupid g4mes, win stupid prizes
events.description: "we have las vegas at home” but this one is for the real pl4yers. gamble for glory (and treats) in a casino night to remember.

events.name: Board Games and Ice Cream
events.description: Are you bored? play a board game! is the weather too hot for comfort? come eat ice cream! neither of those things? still come and make some new friends :)

events.name: Karaoke
events.description: Come sing your heart out to your favorite songs and make some new friends!

events.name: Baker Skyline
events.description: Come to Baker to enjoy a night of pizza, music and dancing, and a chance to win old Baker merch!

events.name: Oh no where'd we go again?
events.description: Come join us in not-being-here.

events.name: MacGregor Dessert Party
events.description: Looking to enjoy some nice desserts on a warm August night? Welcome to MacG's dessert party!

events.name: Poker Chips and Chips
events.description: Craving a late-night snack? Want to learn how to play poker in a casual, low-stakes setting? Both? Come feast on chips with Next House's poker enthusiasts! (just don't eat the poker chips)

events.name: Top of the Sponge
events.description: party on simmons rooftop!!

events.name: Late Night Snacking
events.description: Get ready to indulge in a night of delicious college comfort foods at our late-night snacking extravaganza! Join us for a night full of ramen, mac and cheese, and popcorn!

events.name: Next Sing Karaoke
events.description: come participate in the classic next house activity of staying up and singing 2010’s music until ungodly hours of the night !!

events.name: Midnight Pancakes
events.description: Come to one of Next House's signature events following a warm wholesome karaoke session. Catch pancakes in the Next House country kitchen (literally)! Chill and talk to Nexties!

events.name: Sunrise on Harvard Bridge
events.description: Get ready for an epic adventure (across the street) at Sunrise on Harvard Bridge! Rise and shine with us as we witness the most breathtaking sunrise in Boston. Kickstart your college adventure with breakfast, friends, and a picture-perfect sunrise.

events.name: Baker Roof Breakfast
events.description: Come grab breakfast on Baker Roof for bagels and acai and chat with some current Baker House Residents!

events.name: Dentry Cafe
events.description: Start/End your day with some despresso, dea, and dastries!

events.name: Dinosaur Pancakes
events.description: Fuel up before REX events with a pancake breakfast!

events.name: Bentry Breakfast
events.description: Come get breakfast at MacGregor B Entry! Meet the residents and eat yummy pancakes.

events.name: B4 Musical Jam
events.description: Ooo la la la, *bangs sticks*, “strums guitar*, *shakes beans*, music to b4’s ears. Come contribute to a musical jam. Be the cool jazz musician you always wished you were! Traditional and non traditional instruments will be provided. No musical experience required. Let’s see what music we can make!

events.name: Hair Dyeing
events.description: If you're worried about what your parents will think, natural colors such as leaf green, sky blue, and grape purple also available.

events.name: Climbing Wall Open Hours
events.description: Come test your skills on our climbing wall on the EC fort!

events.name: Hair Dyeing
events.description: If you're worried about what your parents will think, natural colors such as leaf green, sky blue, and grape purple also available.

events.name: GATAS
events.description: Play a classic Simmons game with Sims!!

events.name: Storyboarding Tim (Murals Without Walls?)
events.description: "Do you love to paint on the walls? Do you love to mural? Disappoint­ing­ly we don't have EC walls... but we do have EC art supplies! Help us make murals depicting our life at MIT.	"

events.name: Grillz and Chillz
events.description: GRILLS R HOT ALL DAY! :D Come pick up a burg with friends

events.name: Hair Dyeing
events.description: If you're worried about what your parents will think, natural colors such as leaf green, sky blue, and grape purple also available.

events.name: Grillz and Chillz
events.description: GRILLS R HOT ALL DAY! :D Come pick up a burg with friends

events.name: Get CrafTEA
events.description: Unleash your creativity to make a custom cup of boba!

events.name: Fruit Anarchy
events.description: One of the only times you’re encouraged to play with your food! We got lots of fruit to do whatever you want (within legal boundaries)

events.name: Grillz and Chillz
events.description: GRILLS R HOT ALL DAY! :D Come pick up a burg with friends

events.name: Maseeh Boba & Botany
events.description: Whether you're an artist or a plant enthusiast (or both!), this event is perfect for you. Sip on some tasty boba tea while you design your unique pot and take home a new leafy friend. It's a great way to unwind, get crafty, and meet new people.

events.name: Sunset Sips and Boba Bliss
events.description: Come drink boba and watch the sunset with A entry.

events.name: Brownie Jenga
events.description: It’s Jenga (yay!) With Brownies! (huh?) Build a tower of questionable edibility! Impress your friends with your mastery of brownie mechanics! We can’t promise this is sensible, but we CAN promise yummy fun.

events.name: J4CKBOX+
events.description: Join house 4 in an intense tournament of Jackbox games. Or, if a grueling competition of wit isn’t your thing, play some classic board games while spectating and munching on some snacks.

events.name: New Vassar Tournament Series: Mini Golf
events.description: Come join us in a three part game tournament. For day three, break out your mini golf skills and try to win a prize!

events.name: Switch it up with House 3
events.description: Come play some switch games in our lounge (with snacks)!

events.name: Dentry Cafe
events.description: Start/End your day with some despresso, dea, and dastries! No, the time is not a typo.

events.name: Waffel Nacht
events.description: it's late. you're hungry. waffle your way on down to german house! its like waffle house but german and not. (we have fruit, syrup, whipped cream, and whatever waffle companions your little heart desires)

events.name: Boba and Karaoke with the Junies!
events.description: You’re working late, cuz you’re a singer! and you look so cute, wrapped ‘round our finger!  Sing your heart out like Sabrina Carpenter with the Junies in our karaoke event! Whether it be Beyonce, Adele, Megan Thee Stallion, or Fetty Wap, we are ready to hear your beautiful voice!

events.name: Smash with Strange Controllers
events.description: Smash...with a guitar hero controller??

events.name: Penthouse Party
events.description: Take pics with the Boston Skyline at Night, eat great food, enjoy mocktails, & dance to the rhythms of your favs! (Bring your friends, we spent so much money on this XD)

events.name: Pinkies
events.description: It’s your favorite diner! Pinkies offers the BEST food including grilled cheese, lemonade, Harry’s monstrosity, and lots more. Prepare for the element of surprise. Embrace the lack of information.

events.name: College Classics
events.description: Prepare to eat all of the college student midnight snack classics!

events.name: McCormick Breakfast House
events.description: Stop by to get your most important meal of the day- McCormick’s got you covered with waffles & fruit in the Country Kitchen!

events.name: New Vassar Street Waffles
events.description: Come and grab some breakfast and meet new friends!

events.name: Penthouse Artisan Affair
events.description: Crafts & snacks at the top of MacGregor.

events.name: Deconstruct the Fort
events.description: Help deconstruct the 3 story fort we so lovingly built and take wood home for your own project! If you like breaking things you'll love deconstruction

events.name: Artsy Ice Cream
events.description: Why settle for regular ice cream when you can have BOSTON'S BEST? For multiple years, Tosci's has been voted by Bostonians to be the BEST and come see why! Come sample some ice cream, paint a mural, and chill with us!

events.name: Climbing Wall Open Hours
events.description: Come test your skills on our climbing wall on the EC fort!

events.name: bmf handroll bar
events.description: build and eat your own custom handrolls! pescetarian/vegan friendly.

events.name: Gaysian Tea Party
events.description: """are you a gay slay? or are you asian? — or both?! come have & spill tea :)   (if you are neither gay nor asian, feel welcome as well!! all people are awesome and we would love to uwu with u!)"""

events.name: DormCon Meet and Greet!
events.description: Connect with members of of MIT DormCon (Dormitory Council) and learn about upcoming opportunities for this year!

events.name: Knotical Nonsense
events.description: Whether you're a thrill-seeker, an adventurer, or just someone who loves to learn new things, 'Knottical Nonsense' is the perfect place to learn to tie knots! You'll discover the knots used by climbers to reach new heights and riggers to lift heavy loads.

events.name: Just Dance
events.description: Just Dance

events.name: New Vassar Movie Night!
events.description: Come chill with friends and watch a fun movie about the emotions living in our heads!

events.name: Deconstruct the Fort
events.description: Help deconstruct the 3 story fort we so lovingly built and take wood home for your own project! If you like breaking things you'll love deconstruction

events.name: Find Your Inner Fursona
events.description: Historically speaking, the beginning of the furry virus came from recording one's animal image on paper. Feel free to come and draw for yourself or others, or get drawn by our talented* artists! Pencil and paper provided.

events.name: eat food to live!
events.description: come get a Real Meal amongst the chaos of rex! featuring homecooked asian food and friends :)

events.name: Queer Ladies’ Movie Night
events.description: Are you queer? Are you a lady? Do you like cookies? Are you none of the above but want to watch a sapphic movie and meet new friends? Then come to Queer Ladies’ Movie Night!

events.name: arcane watch party
events.description: come watch arcane season 1 with us! season 2 is coming soon so... :eyes:

events.name: do embroidery while watching anime (snacks included)
events.description: pretend the late stage capitalism of fast fashion hasn't destroyed the textile industry and spend some relaxing time doing the embroidery all the "strong" female characters in historical media complain about. there will also be fabric for other types of hand sewing, and snacks

events.name: Candyland Carnival
events.description: Play your favorite game, learn a new one, or grab a computer and game with new friends and sweet treats in the best game room on campus.

events.name: Deconstruct the Fort
events.description: Help deconstruct the 3 story fort we so lovingly built and take wood home for your own project! If you like breaking things you'll love deconstruction

events.name: crepes + cartoons
events.description: celebrate the last day of REX by curling up with a plate of crepes and some classic cartoons!

events.name: Lindor Butler Academy
events.description: Come hone your butlering skills at the Lindor butler academy. Learn to serve chocolate, and indulge in some yourself.

events.name: Paint the Skyline
events.description: What's better than free art supplies? Painting the best view in MIT with those supplies, of course! Come to the McCormick East Penthouse to get your creative juices flowing, paint, and make a keepsake.

events.name: Holey Moly
events.description: Come hang out and learn about topology - the mathematical study of shapes - while eating hole-themed food. Learn about counting holes (and co-holes??), knots, and homeomorphisms

events.name: Deconstruct the Fort
events.description: Help deconstruct the 3 story fort we so lovingly built and take wood home for your own project! If you like breaking things you'll love deconstruction

events.name: Multitools and Multivitamins
events.description: Learn all the different uses of a multivitamin, and why you should eat two multitools per day!

events.name: Become 2% Milk
events.description: Drink enough milk to become 2% milk. Nondairy options available.

events.name: Deconstruct the Fort
events.description: Help deconstruct the 3 story fort we so lovingly built and take wood home for your own project! If you like breaking things you'll love deconstruction

events.name: Fried Rice Friday
events.description: c o n s u m e; vegetarian and vegan friendly!

events.name: Pasta Phriday
events.description: We are drowning in spaghetti. Please save us from this situation by eating all the pasta. (meatballs, chickpeas and spinach for plant lovers are provided)

events.name: Deconstruct the Fort
events.description: Help deconstruct the 3 story fort we so lovingly built and take wood home for your own project! If you like breaking things you'll love deconstruction

events.name: Spinning on Roofdeck
events.description: Want to learn spinning arts? Come to the roofdeck!
